featured.text: When the Spanish explorers went to Mexico, they saw the Aztec kings 15 umbrellas.
The idea was developed when a Spanish designer travelling to the Philippines observed a traditional Filipino shirt 22 together with the fibers of pineapple leaves.

definition.zh_def: 西班牙的，或與西班牙有關的；西班牙語。
definition.en_def: Relating to Spain or its people or language.
definition.example: She is learning Spanish to communicate better during her travels.
